permissions: User must have a broker membership for the trucker application's broker organization.
side_effects: Creates a trucker from the application data, marks the application as approved, and can set the application user as the trucker manager.
validation_notes: trucker-application is required. Approval fails if the trucker application is already approved.

flags.name: --add-application-user-as-trucker-manager
flags.description: Add the application user as a trucker manager
